author: jinfwhuang
content:
I created this simple PR to get the conversation going about a p2p approach. As mentioned previously in this thread, we could very well dismiss this approach after some discussions. Instead, we focus on building a p2p approach based on portal network, and also a N-server approach. Regardless, it will be a very useful exercise to think through the input data for the light client. 

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/2786
